ADMA When I buy shares for long term pull and not 3 month options then my time horizon and perspective changes I relax Suddenly the intrinsic value of the company plays a large role in the valuation of the stock price as I perceive it If another competitor wanted to start from scratch and have the collection centers and FDA approved manufacturing license for the manufacturing facility what would it cost to make it happen Thats just the beginning Add the FDA approvals as value Ivig shortagesthats a premiumThe rest is just as a natural progression in time So in my mind 6 to 8 is the real value and support in 2019 US dollarsAnything under that Ill keep adding patiently Anyone that wants to sell ADMA short under 6 be my guest Its a losing proposition imho
